name: The Fool
meaning_up: Beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit, new journeys, faith in the future, unknown potential.
meaning_rev: Naivety, foolishness, recklessness, risk-taking, holding back, insecurity, fear of the unknown.

name: The Magician
meaning_up: Manifestation, willpower, resourcefulness, skill, power, inspired action, creative potential.
meaning_rev: Manipulation, poor planning, latent talents, deceit, illusion, out of touch with reality.

name: The High Priestess
meaning_up: Intuition, higher powers, mystery, subconscious mind, spirituality, divine feminine, secrets.
meaning_rev: Hidden agendas, secrets, confusion, cognitive dissonance, repressed intuition, need to listen to inner voice.

name: The Empress
meaning_up: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance, creativity, motherhood, fertility.
meaning_rev: Creative block, dependence on others, insecurity, smothering, emptiness, lack of growth.

name: The Emperor
meaning_up: Authority, structure, control, fatherhood, stability, leadership, a solid foundation.
meaning_rev: Domination, excessive control, rigidity, inflexibility, lack of discipline, tyrannical.

name: The Hierophant
meaning_up: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions, guidance, conventionality.
meaning_rev: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging tradition, unconventionality, rebellion, new approaches.

name: The Lovers
meaning_up: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices, partnership, union.
meaning_rev: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values, conflict, difficult choices, separation.

name: The Chariot
meaning_up: Control, willpower, victory, assertion, determination, success, action, ambition.
meaning_rev: Lack of control, lack of direction, aggression, obstacles, self-discipline issues, opposition.

name: Strength
meaning_up: Strength, courage, patience, control, compassion, inner power, influence.
meaning_rev: Weakness, self-doubt, lack of self-discipline, vulnerability, raw emotion, insecurity.

name: The Hermit
meaning_up: Soul-searching, introspection, solitude, guidance, wisdom, inner reflection, withdrawal.
meaning_rev: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal, paranoia, reclusiveness, anti-social.

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning_up: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point, change, fate.
meaning_rev: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles, negative external forces, out of control.

name: Justice
meaning_up: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law, clarity, accountability.
meaning_rev: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty, injustice, imbalance, legal flaws.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning_up: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives, suspension, sacrifice, martyrdom.
meaning_rev: Stalling, needless sacrifice, resistance, indecision, delays, stubbornness.

name: Death
meaning_up: Endings, change, transformation, transition, letting go, release, new beginnings.
meaning_rev: Fear of change, holding on, stagnation, resistance to change, decay, repeating negative patterns.

name: Temperance
meaning_up: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose, meaning, finding middle ground, harmony.
meaning_rev: Imbalance, excess, extremes, lack of patience, discord, recklessness.

name: The Devil
meaning_up: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality, materialism, bondage.
meaning_rev: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment, freedom, breaking free.

name: The Tower
meaning_up: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening, disaster, destruction.
meaning_rev: Avoidance of disaster, fear of change, resisting change, averting crisis, personal transformation.

name: The Star
meaning_up: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality, inspiration, healing, serenity.
meaning_rev: Lack of faith, despair, discouragement, insecurity, disconnection, hopelessness.

name: The Moon
meaning_up: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition, dreams, uncertainty.
meaning_rev: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion, clarity, understanding, truth.

name: The Sun
meaning_up: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality, joy, optimism, enlightenment.
meaning_rev: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic, sadness, lack of success, pessimism.

name: Judgement
meaning_up: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution, awakening, reflection, reckoning.
meaning_rev: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call, lack of self-awareness, fear of judgement.

name: The World
meaning_up: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel, fulfillment, wholeness, unity.
meaning_rev: Lack of completion, lack of closure, incompletion, short-cuts, delays, emptiness.

name: Ace of Wands
meaning_up: Inspiration, new opportunities, growth, potential, creative spark, new initiative, new passion.
meaning_rev: Delays, lack of motivation, hesitation, creative blocks, missed opportunity, indecision.

name: Two of Wands
meaning_up: Future planning, progress, decisions, discovery, foresight, personal power, making plans.
meaning_rev: Fear of unknown, lack of planning, indecision, restlessness, restricted options, impatience.

name: Three of Wands
meaning_up: Preparation, foresight, expansion, overseas opportunities, growth, looking ahead.
meaning_rev: Lack of foresight, delays, obstacles to long-term goals, frustration, holding back.

name: Four of Wands
meaning_up: Celebration, joy, harmony, relaxation, homecoming, stability, community.
meaning_rev: Lack of communication, instability, transition, feeling unwelcome, lack of support.

name: Five of Wands
meaning_up: Conflict, disagreements, competition, tension, strife, ambition, rivalry.
meaning_rev: Conflict avoidance, diversity, releasing tension, finding solutions, agreement.

name: Six of Wands
meaning_up: Success, public recognition, victory, progress, self-confidence, triumph.
meaning_rev: Egotism, lack of recognition, self-doubt, fall from grace, punishment.

name: Seven of Wands
meaning_up: Challenge, competition, perseverance, protection, standing up for beliefs, defensiveness.
meaning_rev: Giving up, overwhelmed, overly protective, exhaustion, compromise.

name: Eight of Wands
meaning_up: Speed, action, air travel, movement, quick decisions, progress, sudden changes.
meaning_rev: Delays, frustration, resisting change, slowness, holding back, stagnation.

name: Nine of Wands
meaning_up: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith, boundaries, last stand, determination.
meaning_rev: On edge, defensive, hesitant, paranoia, giving up, lack of boundaries.

name: Ten of Wands
meaning_up: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, stress, oppression, carrying a heavy load.
meaning_rev: Delegating, release, lightness, letting go of burdens, managing stress, burnout.

name: Page of Wands
meaning_up: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, free spirit, enthusiasm, new creative projects.
meaning_rev: Newly-formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs, a spiritual path, new ideas, haste.

name: Knight of Wands
meaning_up: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness, ambition, moving forward.
meaning_rev: Haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration, impulsiveness, recklessness.

name: Queen of Wands
meaning_up: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination, joy, warmth.
meaning_rev: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, a departure from independence, jealousy, insecurity.

name: King of Wands
meaning_up: Natural-born leader, vision, entrepreneur, honour, charisma, control, big picture.
meaning_rev: Impulsiveness, haste, ruthless, high expectations, lack of leadership, delays.

name: Ace of Cups
meaning_up: New love, compassion, creativity, overwhelming emotion, new relationships, joy, emotional awakening.
meaning_rev: Blocked or repressed emotions, emptiness, unrequited love, emotional loss, creative block.

name: Two of Cups
meaning_up: Unified love, partnership, mutual attraction, connection, harmony, shared values.
meaning_rev: Self-love, break-ups, disharmony, distrust, imbalance in a relationship.

name: Three of Cups
meaning_up: Celebration, friendship, creativity, collaborations, community, social events.
meaning_rev: Independence, alone time, hardcore partying, 'three's a crowd', isolation, gossip.

name: Four of Cups
meaning_up: Meditation, contemplation, apathy, re-evaluation, discontent, missed opportunities.
meaning_rev: Retreat, withdrawal, checking in for alignment, new perspective, choosing gratitude.

name: Five of Cups
meaning_up: Regret, failure, disappointment, pessimism, loss, grief, self-pity.
meaning_rev: Personal setbacks, self-forgiveness, moving on, acceptance, finding peace.

name: Six of Cups
meaning_up: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence, joy, nostalgia, simplicity.
meaning_rev: Living in the past, forgiveness, lacking playfulness, stuck in childhood, rose-tinted glasses.

name: Seven of Cups
meaning_up: Opportunities, choices, wishful thinking, illusion, fantasy, imagination, indecision.
meaning_rev: Alignment, personal values, overwhelmed by choices, lack of purpose, reality check.

name: Eight of Cups
meaning_up: Disappointment, abandonment, withdrawal, escapism, walking away, seeking something more.
meaning_rev: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting, walking away, hopelessness.

name: Nine of Cups
meaning_up: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wishes fulfilled, happiness, abundance, pleasure.
meaning_rev: Inner happiness, materialism, dissatisfaction, indulgence, not getting what you want.

name: Ten of Cups
meaning_up: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment, family, joy, fulfilment.
meaning_rev: Disconnectedness, misaligned values, struggling relationships, seeking harmony, broken home.

name: Page of Cups
meaning_up: Creative opportunities, intuitive messages, curiosity, possibility, surprise, emotional openness.
meaning_rev: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks, emotional immaturity, insecurity.

name: Knight of Cups
meaning_up: Creativity, romance, charm, imagination, beauty, following your heart, artistic pursuits.
meaning_rev: Overactive imagination, unrealistic, jealous, moody, disappointment, emotional unavailability.

name: Queen of Cups
meaning_up: Compassionate, caring, emotionally stable, intuitive, in flow, supportive, empathetic.
meaning_rev: Inner feelings, self-care, self-love, co-dependency, emotional insecurity, martyrdom.

name: King of Cups
meaning_up: Emotionally balanced, compassionate, diplomatic, counsellor, wise, tolerant, calm.
meaning_rev: Self-compassion, inner feelings, moodiness, emotionally manipulative, repressed emotions.

name: Ace of Swords
meaning_up: Breakthroughs, new ideas, mental clarity, success, truth, new way of thinking, new perspective.
meaning_rev: Confusion, clouded judgment, lack of clarity, misinformation, intellectual stagnation, destructive thinking.

name: Two of Swords
meaning_up: Difficult choices, indecision, stalemate, impasse, avoidance, weighing options.
meaning_rev: Indecision, confusion, information overload, mental turmoil, fear of the unknown.

name: Three of Swords
meaning_up: Heartbreak, emotional pain, sorrow, grief, hurt, separation, sadness.
meaning_rev: Negative self-talk, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness, recovery from heartbreak.

name: Four of Swords
meaning_up: Rest, relaxation, meditation, contemplation, recuperation, peace, stillness.
meaning_rev: Exhaustion, burn-out, deep contemplation, stagnation, restlessness, lack of progress.

name: Five of Swords
meaning_up: Conflict, disagreements, competition, defeat, winning at all costs, betrayal, ambition.
meaning_rev: Reconciliation, making amends, past resentment, desire to forgive, compromise.

name: Six of Swords
meaning_up: Transition, change, rite of passage, releasing baggage, moving on, journey.
meaning_rev: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business, emotional baggage, feeling stuck.

name: Seven of Swords
meaning_up: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, acting strategically, stealth, sneakiness.
meaning_rev: Imposter syndrome, self-deceit, keeping secrets, guilt, confessing, turning a new leaf.

name: Eight of Swords
meaning_up: Negative thoughts, self-imposed restriction, imprisonment, victim mentality, limiting beliefs.
meaning_rev: Self-limiting beliefs, inner critic, releasing negative thoughts, open to new perspectives, freedom.

name: Nine of Swords
meaning_up: Anxiety, worry, fear, depression, nightmares, stress, despair, insomnia.
meaning_rev: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing worry, seeking help, recovery.

name: Ten of Swords
meaning_up: Painful endings, deep wounds, betrayal, loss, crisis, rock bottom, martyrdom.
meaning_rev: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end, can't get worse, forgiveness.

name: Page of Swords
meaning_up: New ideas, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, new ways of communicating, energetic, talkative.
meaning_rev: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haste, undelivered promises, manipulation.

name: Knight of Swords
meaning_up: Ambitious, action-oriented, driven to succeed, fast-thinking, direct, focused.
meaning_rev: Restless, unfocused, impulsive, burn-out, aggressive, opinionated.

name: Queen of Swords
meaning_up: Independent, unbiased judgement, clear boundaries, direct communication, intelligent, perceptive.
meaning_rev: Overly-emotional, easily influenced, bitchy, cold-hearted, cruel, pessimistic.

name: King of Swords
meaning_up: Mental clarity, intellectual power, authority, truth, logic, structure, directness.
meaning_rev: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation, irrationality, tyrannical.

name: Ace of Pentacles
meaning_up: New financial opportunity, manifestation, abundance, prosperity, new job or business, material stability.
meaning_rev: Lost opportunity, lack of planning, missed chances, financial insecurity, scarcity mindset.

name: Two of Pentacles
meaning_up: Multiple priorities, time management, prioritisation, adaptability, balancing resources.
meaning_rev: Over-committed, disorganisation, reprioritisation, financial disarray, imbalance.

name: Three of Pentacles
meaning_up: Teamwork, collaboration, learning, implementation, skill development, mastery.
meaning_rev: Disharmony, misalignment, working alone, lack of teamwork, poor quality work.

name: Four of Pentacles
meaning_up: Saving money, security, conservatism, scarcity, control, possession, frugality.
meaning_rev: Over-spending, greed, self-protection, letting go of control, generosity.

name: Five of Pentacles
meaning_up: Financial loss, poverty, lack mindset, isolation, worry, insecurity, hardship.
meaning_rev: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty, positive change, acceptance, forgiveness.

name: Six of Pentacles
meaning_up: Giving, receiving, sharing wealth, generosity, charity, gratitude, balance.
meaning_rev: Debt, selfishness, one-sided charity, string attached, conditional giving.

name: Seven of Pentacles
meaning_up: Long-term view, sustainable results, perseverance, investment, patience, reaping rewards.
meaning_rev: Lack of long-term vision, limited success or reward, impatience, shortsightedness, wasted effort.

name: Eight of Pentacles
meaning_up: Apprenticeship, repetitive tasks, mastery, skill development, diligence, craftsmanship.
meaning_rev: Self-development, perfectionism, misdirected activity, lack of ambition, repetitive or boring work.

name: Nine of Pentacles
meaning_up: Abundance, luxury, self-sufficiency, financial independence, rewards, gratitude, culmination.
meaning_rev: Financial dependency, superficiality, over-spending, hustling, working too hard, isolation.

name: Ten of Pentacles
meaning_up: Wealth, financial security, family, legacy, inheritance, abundance, long-term success.
meaning_rev: Fleeting success, financial failure, loneliness, lack of stability, breaking traditions.

name: Page of Pentacles
meaning_up: Manifestation, financial opportunity, skill development, new job, ambition, practicality.
meaning_rev: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure, financial GUST, short-term focus.

name: Knight of Pentacles
meaning_up: Hard work, productivity, routine, conservatism, diligence, efficiency, responsibility.
meaning_rev: Self-discipline, boredom, feeling 'stuck', perfectionism, laziness, lack of motivation.

name: Queen of Pentacles
meaning_up: Nurturing, practical, providing financially, a working parent, resourceful, down-to-earth.
meaning_rev: Financial independence, self-care, work-home conflict, smothering, martyrdom, jealousy.

name: King of Pentacles
meaning_up: Wealth, business, leadership, security, discipline, abundance, prosperity, success.
meaning_rev: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth and status, stubborn, controlling, possessive.
